text: Yevhen Kotelnykov (21 March 1939 – 19 December 2017) was a Soviet soccer player and coach from Ukraine. ==External links== * Yevhen Kotelnykov: "I am excited by our victory in Montenegro". Komanda. 11 June 2013. * Novobranets, V. Yevhen Kotelnykov: "It is impossible to copy Lobanovsky". Komanda. 6 January 2014. * Sai, Yu. Merited Coach of Ukraine Yevhen Kotelnykov: "heading towards the coaching seat, Lobanovsky never stepped on the lines that divide running lanes". Fakty. 21 March 2003. * Match report of the game between Belarus and Ukraine, 27 July 1983. * Brief bio at the Football Federation of Ukraine website. title: Yevhen Kotelnykov
